Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0

  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.2.1 compatible GPU with 512 MB of video RAM
